message.body: Hey friend, what's your schedule for the day? Ben still hasn't shown up here and I'm supposed to meet his girlfriend this weekend. I wish he hadn't bailed yesterday! I'm still good to come to providence, though!
Im done at the doc's by noonish, & my mom is arriving by train to westerly at 352 thats all i got
Ill be waiting at Pastiche Fine Desserts, 92 spruce st
Yay! Ben just walked in, leaving in 5!
